snippet: A new labor deal in the NBA is on the verge of being finalized, after owners voted Wednesday to approve a proposed seven-year collective bargaining agreement that was tentatively agreed to last week....
lead_paragraph: A new labor deal in the NBA is on the verge of being finalized, after owners voted Wednesday to approve a proposed seven-year collective bargaining agreement that was tentatively agreed to last week.

headline.main: AP Sources: Owners Pass New Labor Deal, Players Next
headline.print_headline: AP Sources: Owners Pass New Labor Deal, Players Next
